means: 引出，探出( elicit的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Threats to reinstate the tax elicited jeer from the Opposition.
sentence.Network_cn: 恢复此项征税的威胁引起了反对党的嘲笑.

sentence.Network_en: The comedian's joke elicited applause and laughter from the audience.
sentence.Network_cn: 那位滑稽演员的笑话博得观众的掌声和笑声.

sentence.Network_en: The police elicited a confession from him.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The disturbance and the pollution of environmental hormone have elicited the attention ., 环境荷尔蒙对环境的污染以及对内分泌的干扰作用已经引起世界各国的广泛关注.
the inquiry elicited these facts .谢谢你提醒我们的错误。
The inquiry elicited these facts ., 调查结果发现下列这些事实.
After much questioning , he elicited the truth from the boy ., 在多次询问后 , 他从这男孩处诱出了真情.

list.abs: 偏好诱导（Preference elicitation）推荐系统（Recommendation system） 聪明行动族社会化商务（Social commerce） 社会信息处 …
（四）构念抽取（construct elicitation）： 运用凯利方格法抽出埋藏在思考与行为下的构念，并以攀梯法引出构念与构念之间的关系。
语言学术语表-碧野无边-搜狐博客 ... elicitation procedure 引发式 elicited imitation 引发模仿 elision 省音.
eliciting 诱发eliciting stimulus 诱发刺激eliminate 排除

entry.def: If you elicit a response or a reaction, you do or say something which makes other people respond or react.

example.ex: Mr Norris said he was hopeful that his request would elicit a positive response...
example.tran: 诺里斯先生说希望他的请求能够引起积极反响。

example.ex: The crime elicited an outcry against illicit drugs.
example.tran: 那起罪行引发了打击违禁药品的呼声。

entry.def: If you elicit a piece of information, you get it by asking the right questions.

example.ex: Phone calls elicited no further information.
example.tran: 几个电话都没有打听到进一步的消息。

means.word_mean: 1. called forth from a latent or potential state by stimulation;

auth_sentence.content: Further NHS reforms elicited the same sucking of teeth.
auth_sentence.res_content: Further NHS reforms elicited the same sucking of teeth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Further NHS reforms elicited the same sucking of teeth.

auth_sentence.content: Having elicited sparks from two flints he lighted a large fire.
auth_sentence.res_content: Having elicited sparks from two flints he lighted a large fire.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Having elicited sparks from two flints he lighted a large fire.

auth_sentence.content: But a CT scan elicited a collective groan from the doctors.
auth_sentence.res_content: But a CT scan elicited a collective groan from the doctors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But a CT scan elicited a collective groan from the doctors.
